# Some suggestions 

Suggestions for summarising the results so far:

## csv file with the list of references

You can create a csv file with five columns like this:
```
region, mountain, search string, comment, url
Eastern Arc Mountains, Uluguru Mountains,"Uluguru Mountains ecosystems", Late Quaternary vegetation dynamics, https://doi.org/10.1016/j.yqres.2009.02.005
Eastern Arc Mountains, Uluguru Mountains,"Uluguru Mountains ecosystems", Effect of forest loss on biodiversity, https://doi.org/10.1017/S0030605302000212
```
